Myrcene.therapeutic: Analgesic & anti-inflammatory (strong preclinical); sedative (preclinical/historical; mixed human data)
Myrcene.pairsBest: β-Caryophyllene (adds body-calm depth), Linalool (smooths into full chill), Pinene (keeps things clear). Quick combos: 'heavy-but-clear' = myrcene + pinene; 'spa-night' = myrcene + linalool

Sweetgrass Organic - 3.5g: α-pinene, β-myrcene, caryophyllene
Uncle Bob - Day Trippin PR: myrcene, β-caryophyllene, farnesene
Sassy Weed Co. - Wake N Flake PR: β-myrcene, β-caryophyllene, d-limonene (2.44% terps)
All Nations - Blackberry Pie PR: limonene, β-caryophyllene, myrcene
Woody Nelson - Flower (3.5g): d-limonene, β-myrcene, trans-nerolidol
Myrcene.quickLine: Mango/earthy; often the 'couchlock' helper in heavier cultivars

Limonene.therapeutic: Anxiolytic/mood (some human signals; small human studies & recent limonene+THC study); antioxidant/anti-inflammatory (preclinical)
Limonene.pairsBest: Pinene (focus + uplift), Terpinolene (complex brightness), β-Caryophyllene (body + mood balance). Quick combos: 'sunny focus' = limonene + pinene; 'citrus calm' = limonene + caryophyllene

Linalool.therapeutic: Anxiolytic & calming (systematic reviews & RCTs w/ lavender oil show benefit; formulation/route matters)
Linalool.pairsBest: Myrcene (deep relaxation combo), Limonene (calm + uplift balance), Bisabolol (floral spa duo). Quick combos: 'lavender dream' = linalool + myrcene; 'balanced calm' = linalool + limonene

β-Caryophyllene.therapeutic: CB2 agonist; anti-inflammatory & analgesic (robust preclinical; emerging translational interest)
β-Caryophyllene.pairsBest: Humulene (classic spicy duo), Myrcene (body + sedation), Limonene (body-calm + mood). Quick combos: 'pepper power' = caryophyllene + humulene; 'balanced body' = caryophyllene + limonene

Sweetgrass Organic - Flower (3.5g): α-pinene, β-myrcene, caryophyllene
β-Caryophyllene.quickLine: Pepper/spice; only terp that binds CB2—think body-calm

Pinene.therapeutic: Anti-inflammatory, bronchodilatory, neuroprotective/cognition-support (preclinical and traditional evidence; limited human data)
Pinene.pairsBest: Limonene (clarity + uplift), Myrcene (clear-headed relaxation), Terpinolene (forest-fresh complexity). Quick combos: 'morning forest' = pinene + limonene; 'clear calm' = pinene + myrcene

Humulene.feelings: Dry, earthy finish; often pairs with BCP for 'quiet body'
Humulene.pairsBest: β-Caryophyllene (dry herb duo), Pinene (forest-floor vibes), Myrcene (earthy depth). Quick combos: 'IPA chill' = humulene + caryophyllene; 'woodland walk' = humulene + pinene

Terpinolene.aroma: Complex floral, piney, citrus with herbal notes
Terpinolene.therapeutic: Antioxidant, anti-proliferative (preclinical); sedative potential in combination (early evidence)
Terpinolene.pairsBest: Limonene (bright uplift), Pinene (clear focus), Ocimene (floral boost). Quick combos: 'morning clarity' = terpinolene + limonene; 'forest spa' = terpinolene + pinene

Terpinolene.quickLine: Complex floral/pine; rare dominant terp with balanced uplift

Ocimene.therapeutic: Anti-inflammatory, antifungal, decongestant (preclinical); traditional respiratory support
Ocimene.pairsBest: Limonene (citrus explosion), Terpinolene (floral harmony), Myrcene (tropical sweetness). Quick combos: 'tropical breeze' = ocimene + limonene; 'flower garden' = ocimene + terpinolene

Bisabolol.feelings: Gentle calm, soothing, relaxing without sedation
Bisabolol.therapeutic: Anti-inflammatory, analgesic, skin-soothing (preclinical & dermatological use); anxiolytic potential (early evidence)
Bisabolol.pairsBest: Linalool (double floral calm), Myrcene (deep relaxation), Limonene (balanced mood-lift). Quick combos: 'chamomile tea' = bisabolol + linalool; 'evening unwind' = bisabolol + myrcene
